title.name: Title
title.tooltip: Disabled for coreTitleId and episodic rights

startLag.name: Start Lag
startLag.tooltip:
format: PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. 
eg. P3Y6M4DT05H30M5S (three years, six months, four days, five hours, thirty minutes, and five seconds)

territory.name: Territory
territory.confirmationContent: Alternatively, you can withdraw the territory.

windowDuration.name: Window Duration
windowDuration.tooltip:
format: PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. 
eg. P3Y6M4DT05H30M5S (three years, six months, four days, five hours, thirty minutes, and five seconds)
